title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 227/93 of 3 February 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3378/91 laying down detailed rules for the sale of butter from intervention stocks for export
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 227/93 of 3 February 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3378/91 laying down detailed rules for the sale of butter from intervention stocks for export
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3378/91, the date '1 November 1990' is hereby replaced by '1 December 1990'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 February 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 148, 28. 6. 1968, p. 13.
(2) OJ No L 215, 30. 7. 1992, p. 64.
(3) OJ No L 319, 21. 11. 1991, p. 40.
(4) OJ No L 383, 29. 12. 1992, p. 48.
